org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode

Class Mech

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.Mech
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chassis, Intakearm, Outake, SwerveDrive

    public abstract class Mech
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    an abstract definition of a mechanism including the ability to run on their own threads all mechs must implement run and init run is called by update and start which should be called in telop init should be called on init in both teleop and auto

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void init(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareMap hardwareMap)
      initialize a given mechanism this is because then mechanisms are completely independent
      void setThread(boolean thread)
      set whether or not a given mech should run on it's own thread
      void updateAndStart(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.Gamepad gamepad)
      run the teleop functions of a mechanism on or off it's own thread this keeps mechanisms isolated from opmodes so it's easy to take something off the robot.

    • Method Detail

      • setThread

        public void setThread(boolean thread)
        set whether or not a given mech should run on it's own thread
        Parameters:
        thread - true if mech should run on it's own thread false if not

      • init

        public abstract void init(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareMap hardwareMap)
        initialize a given mechanism this is because then mechanisms are completely independent
        Parameters:
        hardwareMap - hardwaremap from the phone

      • updateAndStart

        public void updateAndStart(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.Gamepad gamepad)
        run the teleop functions of a mechanism on or off it's own thread this keeps mechanisms isolated from opmodes so it's easy to take something off the robot. calls the run method of a mechanism if it runs on it's own thread this will not run two threads for a single mechanism
        Parameters:
        gamepad - gamepad from opmode to run based on
